Invocation Name: digital bytes podcast
Developer Terms of Use
des: Keep up to date with the talk show that covers the weekly Digital Bytes Newsletter, as heard on Cyber.FM You can pause and play by saying "Alexa, pause" and "Alexa, resume." Just say "Alexa, stop" when you're done for the day. When listening to podcasts you can say "Alexa, shuffle" to shuffle the playing order, or "Alexa, loop" to loop the current episode. You can also ask for previous and next episodes by saying "Alexa, previous" and "Alexa, next". Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer. For more information, visit https://cyber.fm
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
